title: Developer Co-Op
miniDescription: My first co-op, where I developed as a full-stack developer, gaining practical skills and valuable experience.
description: Contributed to the development of a machine-learning-powered advisor insights web application, using TypeScript, Vue.js, SCSS, and FastAPI to enhance functionality and user experience.

Developed 8 new full features, including a global search function and back-end functionality for favouriting advisor opportunities, directly supporting business intelligence and decision-making for advisors.
Worked in an agile environment with a cross-functional team of designers, developers, and product managers to ensure high-quality and accessible web applications.

title: Portfolio
miniDescription: A personal portfolio showcasing my software development abilities, with a focus on interactive features.
description: Designed and developed a personal portfolio website using Vue.js, TypeScript, and SCSS to showcase projects and technical skills.
Enhanced user engagement with dynamic background animations using Vanta.js.
Implemented responsive design for optimal performance across devices, including mobile.
Added accessibility features and used Axios and Pinia for efficient data management.

title: SportIQs
miniDescription: A dynamic sports trivia website developed to offer an engaging experience with interactive quizzes.
description: Engineered a sports trivia game using React, providing interactive quizzes and dynamic updates.
Utilized Vite for efficient building and fast development cycles.
Implemented state management to handle user interactions and quiz progress seamlessly.

title: Djibouti
miniDescription: An educational game inspired by Wordle, designed to help players learn about countries through daily puzzles.
description: Developed Djibouti, an educational game inspired by Wordle to teach players about countries.
Created daily puzzles that encourage learning about geography in an interactive format.
Used Jasmine for testing to ensure a reliable user experience.

title: Password Manager
miniDescription: A secure password manager application built in Python to store and encrypt user credentials.
description: Built a Password Manager application in Python to securely store user credentials.
Utilized cryptographic techniques such as password-based key derivation and Fernet encryption for enhanced security.
Implemented functionalities for viewing, adding, and generating passwords securely with a user-friendly interface.

title: Front-End Developer
miniDescription: Worked with business stakeholders to build and maintain web pages, applying design feedback to improve usability.
description: Assisted in building and maintaining business web pages for a local small business using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript.
Communicated with company owners to gather feedback and adjust interface designs, improving usability and online presence.
Proposed design solutions to align with evolving business needs, contributing to the website strategy during its initial stages.
